scripts.start:production: cd ./sites/corp && npm install --prefix=../.. -loglevel info && cd ../.. && npx turbo run build --filter=app-corp && turbo run start
scripts.start:corp: cd ./sites/corp && npm install --prefix=../.. -loglevel info && cd ../.. && npx turbo run build --filter=app-corp && turbo run start --filter=app-corp
scripts.start:net: cd ./sites/net && npm install --prefix=../.. -loglevel info && cd ../.. && npx turbo run build --filter=app-net && turbo run start && cd ./sites/net && npm run next:start
scripts.dev:corp: cd sites/corp && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev --experimental-https
